description: Italy is now the European country worst affected by coronavirus and 11 towns have been cordoned off.
title: Coronavirus: Quarantine raises virus fears in northern Italy
title_page: Coronavirus: Quarantine raises virus fears in northern Italy - BBC News
maintext: Lombardy and Veneto - the two most affected regions - make up 30% of the Italian economy. Italy's growth is already estimated at just 0.1% for 2019 - the lowest in the eurozone. The talk now is that the impact of the virus could tip it into recession.
